name: Triangles and more triangles and more..
name_original: Triangles and more triangles and more..
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 51 -  Compo

The game is a puzzle game, where you have all the time in the world to solve each level, not that it's hard puzzles, it's just that the universe will kick your game board every 10 seconds, making it harder and harder to actually finish a level.

**Controls** Mouse drag and drop with the left button.

Enjoy.

Be careful what you place where the angles don't match 100% it'll be very hard to find your mistake!
